title: By the Lord Lieutenant and councell upon consideration of the annexed instrument, whereby it is concluded and accorded that there shall be a further continuation of the cessation of armes ... untill the last day of Ianuary next ensuing ...
author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1641-1649 : Ormonde)
notes: Other title information from first lines of text.
"Given at His Majesties castle of Dublin, 18. November, 1644."
Imperfect: tightly bound with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
